[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 04 - Bilanz includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent of 1,732 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 541,339. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent that should add to 1,732 are comprised of the following:
+ AndereRuecklagen -117,928 + Hybridkapital 496,582 + CapitalReserve 133,919 + IssuedCapital 27,574 + RetainedEarnings 1,192
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 04 - Bilanz. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent Total Value : 1,732 Total period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900BKFJBI0QRDJH63/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/lenzingaktiengesellschaft.zip/lenzingaktiengesellschaft/reports/lenzingaktiengesellschaft.xhtml 45543
